attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why cant pubs be allowed a smoke room to give the customer a choice of smoking or none smoking.having spoke to hundreds of people (smokers and none smokers)most people think it is wrong to have their rights taken away from them.spain has done a u turn and you can smoke in certain bars.is smoking going to be outlawed in jails or is it just the innocent who this law is aimed at.
as far as i am concerned it is no smoke no vote for me

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
